DOC.brief_title: A Comparative Study Two Daily Disposable Contact Lenses Higher Myopia Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: Participants expect attend 4 office visit . Visit 1 Screening/Enrollment visit . At Visit 2 ( Baseline Visit ) , participant randomize study lens trial fit . At Visit 3 ( Dispense Visit ) , participant receive study lens approximately 1 week wear . Visit 4 Exit visit . Expected duration participation study 3 week .
DOC.criteria: Sign Informed Consent document ; Higher degree myopia eye , i.e . habitual contact lens power 10.00 diopter ( D ) 17.00D ; Best correct distance visual acuity great equal 20/30 eye ( measure either spectacle refraction habitual contact lenses plus refraction ) ; Manifest astigmatism less equal 1.00D ; Soft contact lens wear eye least 5 day per week least 8 hour per day ; Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Pregnant lactating ; Eye injury surgery within twelve week immediately prior enrollment ; Any ocular condition contraindicates contact lens wear ; History herpetic keratitis ; Any use systemic ocular medication contact lens wear could contraindicate , include use topical ocular medication would require instillation contact lens wear , except approve lubricating drop ; Clinical significant dry eye respond treatment ; Previous corneal refractive surgery irregular cornea ; Requires read glass ; Participation clinical trial ( include contact lens contact lens care product ) within previous 30 day ; Wears habitual lens extend wear modality ( routinely sleep lens overnight 1 night per week ) last 3 month prior enrollment ; Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
